DataElement.preferredName: Prior Whole-Brain Radiotherapy Administered Yes No Unknown Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/unknown indicator for information related to the prior administration of radiation treatment modality used as major component in treatment of primary and metastatic brain tumors.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the prior administration of radiation treatment modality used as major component in treatment of primary and metastatic brain tumors.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Radiation treatment modality used as major component in treatment of primary and metastatic brain tumors. This is a standard treatment for multiple brain metastases.

Concepts.definition: Radiation treatment modality used as major component in treatment of primary and metastatic brain tumors. This is a standard treatment for multiple brain metastases.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior external beam radiation therapy to the brain or whole brain radiation therapy

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had previous radiotherapy to the scalp, cranium, brain, or  skull base?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRFT TEXT 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had previous radiotherapy to the scalp, cranium, brain, skull base or radiation-induced meningiomas?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Stereotactic radiation or whole-brain radiation within 3 months prior to the anticipated Cycle 1, Day 1

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Stereotactic radiation or whole-brain radiation within 28 days prior to the anticipated Cycle 1, Day 1

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Stereotactic radiation or whole-brain radiation within 28 days prior to randomization

ReferenceDocuments.name: Prior Therapies Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient receive prior whole brain radiation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CE7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Had the patient received prior cranial radiotherapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Stereotactic radiation or whole-brain radiation within 4 weeks prior to randomization?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_TEXT10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received prior whole brain radiotherapy or prophylactic cranial irradiation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_TEXT11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received prior cranial radiotherapy, including whole brain radiotherapy, or stereotactic radiation to resection site?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient has brain metastases have they been previously treated with whole brain radiation and are they clinically stable from a neurological standpoint after completing radiotherapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_TEXT12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received prior radiotherapy to the brain (WBRT, SRS, FSRS, or prophylactic    cranial irradiation [PCI])

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 01.04.2024 Added AQT and Alt Short Name per request ticket CADSR0003248_mmt
